Title: Heroic Origins
Plot: Convinced that the study group was destined to meet, Abed pieces together everyone's past revealing that their lives have always been intertwined. Chang tries to destroy Greendale once and for all.
Writer: Stephen Basilone, Annie Mebane, Maggie Bandur
GuestStars: Joe Lo Truglio, Iqbal Theba, Natasha Leggero, Luke Youngblood, Jordan Black, Alix Elizabeth Gitter, Carla Jimenez, Dusan Brown, Milton T.J. Taylor, Tracy Meyer, Thomas Kasp
